entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 2:53 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: NE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
